EmailTemplate.subject: Copado Certification Maintenance Window for {!redwing__Training_Plan__c.Name} is Live!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
The {!redwing__Training_Plan__c.Name} module is now available.
Remember that you will need to complete the exam before {!redwing__Training_Plan__c.Maintenance_Expiration_Date__c} to be able to maintain your credentials. You can find the Maintenance Certification Module under your profile in Academy. You can register for maintenance from here. Don't forget to complete your maintenance by {!redwing__Training_Plan__c.Maintenance_Expiration_Date__c}
Don't let your certification expire!
Best regards, The Academy Team
